mapper.select: select om.om_code, om.m_id, om.om_rdate, os.os_code, p.p_code, p.p_name, p.p_price, os.os_cnt, p.p_price*os.os_cnt os_money from tblproduct p, tblordersub os, tblordermain om where p.p_code = os.p_code and om.om_code = os.om_code and om.m_id = #{m_id} order by om.om_code desc limit #{pageAmount} offset ${(pageNum-1)*pageAmount}
select * from tblordermain where m_id = #{m_id} order by om_code desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into tblordersub (om_code, p_code, os_cnt) values (#{om_code}, #{p_code}, #{os_cnt})
mapper.select: select os.os_code, p.p_code, p.p_name, p.p_price, os.os_cnt, p.p_price*os.os_cnt os_money from tblproduct p, tblordersub os where p.p_code = os.p_code and os.om_code = #{om_code}
select sum(p.p_price * os.os_cnt) om_total from tblproduct p, tblordersub os where p.p_code = os.p_code and os.om_code = #{om_code}
